Articles.Content:
This is something we used to do one the SE Forums. You pretty much say what you did today. Doesn't really matter what it is. Feel free to make jokes and other such, but do not go against the forum rules or discuss things that belong in other threads!

I'll start:

I woke up. :P:P
I played World of Tanks Blitz. My incompetence shows well there

I got jumpgate TRI working.

Gotta love it.
I've been busy like a bee, especially for it being Saturday. Will report back later!
Writing an essay about German Reunification, decided not to quit the KSP forums.
I learned how to cook eggs after accidentely breaking them into a pot of boiling water (Protip: do not break eggs into a pot of boiling water unless you really know what you're doing)
I listened to the Five Nights at Freddy's song several dozen times.

I listened to the Five Nights at Freddy's song several dozen times.

How....how is that possible?!

Update on my day, I took a nap and contemplated learning to script KSP mods. Although I have good ideas for planets for a planet mod, I decided no, I'll keep with the Outer Planets mod.

Also progressed on Blu Aerodynamics and Robotics Industries first craft. Waiting for people who want to sign up to show themselves
I tried to learn more of pi, seems like 75 is my limit when I only practice it once or twice a day.

I played KSP only to find that several of my mod DLLs were deleted for no reason again. Went through and reinstalled them only to find that parachutes on existing craft were broken due to RealChute's DLL being deleted. No idea what the cause is, but I suspect that one of my mods is causing it.
Wasted my life away on KSP.
Tried To Get My Editing Software To Work for My Video!!!!

Wasted my life away on KSP.

One does not simply "waste their life" while playing KSP.

Today I worked on this extraplanetary settlement I've been building on Roblox. It's difficult!
tOdAy I bEcAmE eNlIgHtEnEd By gReEn IrOn CrOwN

tOdAy I bEcAmE eNlIgHtEnEd By gReEn IrOn CrOwN

Please don't bring this here. I know I said anything from the actual forums, but I really don't want in in the whole Red and Green Iron Crown stuff, and I definitely don't want the stuff on this thread. I'd rather have this thread to be on funny, average day stuff instead of this confusing Iron Crown stuff.

Besides that, yesterday Blu got 2 more employees. I'm happy about that

They did indeed, and I'm one of them.

Working on my updated Docking tutorial. KSP updates faster than I can make it, and I get totally sidetracked by the new features every time.
I worked and then spammed a bit in forum games.
Went to school and then started up Space Engineers
Converted my old travel journal from HTML and FRAMES(!!!!!!!!!) to php and reduced the number of files on the server by.......a lot.
Memorized five more decimal places of pierce, after coming home from my brother's basketball game, after going to the doctor, after school. No ksp yet, still have not started homework.
Dusted off a very slighly dusty thread.

Today was unremarkable, but yesterday I solved the 8 Queens Puzzle (I was told this was a genius-level challenge)!

The goal is to place 8 queens on a chessboard such that no queen is threatening another queen's square.

Had a guy today sit in my office and tell me that I didn't respect him because he was a multimillionaire.

"I'm a multimillionaire. No one as young as me has as much money and that's why you don't respect me. I'm a multimillionaire."

He then asked me to compromise US Federal regulations, my principles, my oath and release $1,500.00 in taxpayer's monies to him that he did not merit.

People never cease to astonish me.

Today I announced that my company, Blu Aerodynamics and Robotics, will soon be uploading some craft, thanks to Bob_Saget. I also checked the SE forums I left due to mistreatment and checked the thread I posted last year that I was rejoining. I was highly offended by the content. At least this forum is better though!

I did nothing

What did you learn to school?

I didn't go

Why didn't you go to school?

I don't know

It's coooooooooooool to know nothing

It's coooooooooooool to know nothing

Take a look, take a look, take a look at the kids on the street, no they never miss a beat, never miss a beat, never miss a beat beat, beat beat.
